${modID}:EventID.NAME: Event Name
DESCRIPTIONS: This is event text, generally used to describe what's happening.
#g~This~ #g~text~ #g~is~ #g~green~ #g~and~ #g~wavy.~
#r@RED@ #r@AND@ #r@VIBRATING@ #r@TEXT.@
#rRed #gGreen #yYellow #bBlue #pPurple. ~Wavy~ @vibrating.@
You have to mark every word individually.
You can also use [#ffffff]white[] hex color codes like this to color text.
This also works in card text! But not on keywords.
OPTIONS: Select card to remove. (You can also stick extra text like this in here.)

${modID}:AlexanderStuck.NAME: Iron Fist Alexander
DESCRIPTIONS: Hello-o? Can you hear me?.
NL Help me! I'm stuck.
NL Hello? Hellooo! Anyone!
NL Oh my stars I'm so happy to see you!
NL I am Alexander, also known as the Iron Fist. And as you can see, I'm stock here.
NL Please, can you help me out of this?
Ahh! Well played good sir. Well Played. Though that mighty wallop of yours almost spelt the end of me!
NL Ha ha ha ha! Well, I'm out now, and that's what counts.
NL I thank you, and as a token of my appreciation, I'd like you to have this

${modID}:AlexanderLava.NAME: Iron Fist Alexander
DESCRIPTIONS: Ngh! Rnnngh! O mountain of fire! Bake me in your flames!
NL Nnngh! Ah, good sir, what business might you have in such a place as this?
NL I hardly think you're here to temper yourself with flame, considering that flesh form of yours.
NL Your timing though, is impeccable as ever! I've been making just the thing for you on my journey here.
NL Take it, I'm sure it'll suit you to a tee.

${modID}:RyaSnake.NAME: Rya
DESCRIPTIONS: Um, oh, it's you. Forgive me. My mind never ceases to churn of late. Hmm, well... I know I can trust you...
NL I saw something, slithering in the pitch black of night. It entered the room next to this one, and never came out.
NL If I'm not mistaken, it took the form of a serpent, just like me...
NL I realise that I shouldn't impose but, if you discover anything, would you please share?
Really... Oh, so there was a secret after all... Oh my...
NL Lady Tanith, my own mother, has deceived me...
NL Was I not... born by the grace of a king?
Select a Card to Share.
OPTIONS: #g[Share] Receive a reward based on the share.
